original_text: then if the man rises again and walks outdoors with his staff, he who struck him shall be clear; only he shall pay for the loss of his time, and shall have him thoroughly healed.
korean_text: 지팡이를 짚고 일어나 걸으면 그를 친 자가 형벌은 면하되 그간의 손해를 배상하고 그가 완치되게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: then if the man rises again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 만일 그 사람이 다시 일어나면

sentences.original_text: and walks outdoors with his staff,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 지팡이를 짚고 밖으로 걸어 다니면

sentences.original_text: he who struck him shall be clear;
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 친 자는 죄가 없을 것이요

sentences.original_text: only he shall pay for the loss of his time,
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 그는 그의 시간 손해를 배상할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall have him thoroughly healed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 완전히 치료하게 해 줄 것이다
